name: hosting-full-stack
description: Hosting the Udacity Udagram Full Stack Application on AWS.

scripts.api:build: cd udagram-api-app && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.api:test: cd udagram-api-app && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.api:deploy: cd udagram-api-app && npm run deploy && cd ..
scripts.fe:build: cd udagram-frontend-app && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.fe:test: cd udagram-frontend-app && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.fe:deploy: cd udagram-frontend-app && npm run deploy && cd ..
scripts.app:deploy: npm run api:deploy && npm run fe:deploy && cd ..

author: Tripv1 (tripv1@fsoft.com.vn)
